level.introtext: Here's a chance to work with STRINGS and OUTPUT
level.endtext: Your skills are OUT of this world!
level.code: You may want to SWAP 2 variables so that they have the other's value. # For example, when variable1 = "hello" and variable2 = "goodbye", # a successful swap will have variable1 = "goodbye" and variable2 = "hello" You need a third temporary (temp) variable in order to make a SWAP. # Try keeping track of which variable has which value: lunch = "sandwich" dinner = "tacos" temp = lunch lunch = dinner dinner = temp print(lunch) print(dinner)
